protocol.name: P-GSE64755-1
protocol.text: Data were normalized by multiplying the value of each gene by the mean of each chip, divided by the average intensity of all mean values. Significantly differentially expressed genes were identified by performing profile analysis using Significance Analysis of Microarrays (SAM) software (Tusher et al., 2001) ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS 5.0 signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-2
text: The microarray experiment consisted in a factorial design comprising two genotypes (col and bbx24-1) and two light treatments (white light and simulated shade). RNA material was extracted from 7-day-old seedlings. Two replicates per treatment were performed using Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChipÂ® (

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-3
protocol.text: Seedlings grown under while light or simulated shade conditions

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-4
text: For RNA expression, 100 mg of fresh seedlings was harvested and frozen immediately in liquid nitrogen. Total RNA was extracted using an RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen,
). Crude RNA preparations were treated with 10 units of RNase-free DNase I (
), and the samples were purified according to the RNeasy plant mini kit protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-5
protocol.text: Biotynlated aRNA were prepared according to the standard ATH1 affymetrix protocol for 5 ug total RNA.

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-6
protocol.text: Hybridized for 16 hours at 45oC on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array

protocol.name: P-GSE64755-7
protocol.text: GeneChip scanned with the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000
